customer_name: Edith Contreras and Luis Estrada Sanchez
site_name: Edith Contreras and Luis Estrada Sanchez

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A male poodle (microchip ID# 991003002372514) born 10/26/24 has a yellow mucousy discharge coming from its right
eye. The licensee had observed this prior to inspection. The licensee's program of veterinary care has instructions for
treatment based on what was observed, but the licensee had not initiated treatment or contacted the attending
veterinarian in regard to the eye. Untreated eye conditions can become worse, can affect the sight of the dog, and can be
painful. The licensee must either initiate treatment based on what is written in the program of veterinary care or contact
the attending veterinarian and follow the attending veterinarian's treatment plan. Correct starting on 9/17/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A male poodle (microchip ID# 991003002372514) born 10/26/24 has a yellow mucousy discharge coming from its right 
eye. The licensee had observed this prior to inspection. The licensee's program of veterinary care has instructions for 
treatment based on what was observed, but the licensee had not initiated treatment or contacted the attending 
veterinarian in regard to the eye. Untreated eye conditions can become worse, can affect the sight of the dog, and can be 
painful. The licensee must either initiate treatment based on what is written in the program of veterinary care or contact 
the attending veterinarian and follow the attending veterinarian's treatment plan. Correct starting on 9/17/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report.
